pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetic Analysis of Populations with Mixed Reproduction // Population genetic analyses for hierarchical analysis of partially clonal populations built upon the architecture of the 'adegenet' package. Originally described in Kamvar, Tabima, and Grnwald (2014) doi:10.7717/peerj.281 with version 2.0 described in Kamvar, Brooks, and Grnwald (2015) doi:10.3389/fgene.2015.00208.
